channel.title: Hi, I'm Andrew from Video Rascal
channel.description:
Hi Everyone. I've been lurking for a few months and have been blown away by all the great content and the quality of people that participate. I hope I can share my experiences and add value.
[VideoRascal.com][1] is currently in MVP form. I've received a lot of great user feedback and am getting ready to release the next version.
I look forward to connecting with everyone!
[1]: https://VideoRascal.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Andrew from Video Rascal
item.dc:creator: David_Sheeks
item.description:
Hello Andrew, nice to meet you.

Read full topic
